nodes.text: Professor H. Hrush was the author of a book entitled The Lost Twenty: Dooku's Rise, though it was published without consent from the proper parties. The book concerned a Jedi Master named Dooku, who resigned from the Jedi Order to found a militarized confederacy of worlds that wished to secede from the Galactic Republic. For a time, Hrush's book was listed as the number-two best-selling book on a list compiled by HoloNet News on the date 13:2:28.

A ranking of the five best-selling books, from 23 BBY, including the number-two ranked The Lost Twenty, appeared in HoloNet News Vol. 531 45 (2002), an in-universe website created to publicize the upcoming Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones film. The website was created by Pablo Hidalgo and Paul Ens, with illustrations by Joe Corroney. H. Hrush was credited for the book in its entry on this list.
